title: Taka no Tsumedan Yoshida Presents "Sengoku Taiga" no Susume

synonyms: Taka no Tsumedan ga "Sengoku Taiga" de Tenka Touitsu Mezashite Mita!
alternative_titles.ja: 鷹の爪団吉田プレゼンツ 『戦国大河』 のススメ

synopsis: A collaboration between Eagle Talon and the mobile game Sengoku Taiga. Yoshida is playing the game and suddenly becomes Yukimura while the Chancellor becomes Ieyasu. Yoshida explains the game mechanics and Chancellor is ecstatic that Yoshida's advice for battle tactics help him defeat Deluxe Fighter's character in the game. Yoshida continues to talk about a special event running from April 24, 2019 - May 8, 2019.
